GSD.product_version: versions from v5.1 to before v5.10.148
GSD.description:
wifi: cfg80211: avoid nontransmitted BSS list corruption

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.148 by commit b0e5c5deb7880be5b8a459d584e13e1f9879d307, it was introduced in version v5.1 by commit 0b8fb8235be8be99a197e8d948fc0a2df8dc261a. For more details please see the references link.
